summary: This mod adds light versions of heavy armors and heavy versions of light armor.
descriptionHtml:
This mod DOES NOT CHANGE STATS. This is only intended so you can have the armor you want, and still get the perks and XP. For example, there is light dwarven armor, and light orcish armor, and heavy leather and heavy glass armor. The stats have not changed at all. All of the armors havee been fully integrated into hold blacksmith lists and NPC inventories.

Let me know if I missed any. This does not add enchanted versions or unique armor such as heavy Dark Brotherhood armor.
author: CommunistTiger
